org.pojava.lang
Class BoundString

java.lang.Object
  org.pojava.lang.BoundString

public class BoundString
extends java.lang.Object

A BoundString represents a String with Bindings. Each binding is represented by a placeholder mapped sequentially to a list of Binding objects.

Author:
John Pile
